TEXT.TITLE: FORD MOTOR CO OF CANADA LTD<FC> CUTS ANNUAL DIV
TEXT.BODY: Annual div six dlrs vs 12 dlrs prior Pay March 19 Record March 13 Note: 1986 payout includes two dlrs a share extra dividend 1985 payout includes four dlrs a share extra dividend Reuter
